text: Unfortunately, I don't possess such a thing.

What I want to express, or who I want to be, 
it doesn't matter.

So I simply interpreted and brought to life the "noctchill's
Higuchi Madoka Higuchi" that was imbued in the costume──────

────Alright! That's a wrap for the photoshoot. 
Thank you very much!

No matter how many times I say it... it was truly wonderful.
You had your own essence, just like the real you.

"noctchill's Madoka Higuchi " will continue to be expressed in the future.
Costumes are the idol's "partner". You can rely on them completely.

To think something like this is enough...
truly──────
